RotationSolver.Basic.Data.StateCommandTy: Start the addon in Manual mode. You need to choose the target manually. This will bypass any engage settings that you have set up and will start attacking immediately once something is targeted.
Stop the addon. Always remember to turn it off when it is not in use!
Start the addon in Auto mode. When out of combat or when combat starts, switches the target according to the set condition.
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.SpecialCommand: Open a window to use AoE heal.
Open a window to use single heal.
Open a window to use AoE defense.
Open a window to use single defense.
Open a window to move forward.
Open a window to move back.
To end this special duration before the set time.
Open a window to use Esuna, tank stance actions or True North.
Open a window to use Raise or Shirk.
Open a window to use knockback immunity actions.
Open a window to speed up.
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.TargetHostileT: Previously engaged targets (engages on countdown timer)
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Analyses PvE combat information in every frame and finds the best action.
Well, you must be a lazy player!
You're tiring RSR out, give it a break!
The condition set you chose, click to modify.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.

Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for GENERAL COMBAT, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
RSR helped you by clicking actions {0:N0} times.
You have said hello to other users {0:N0} times!
RotationSolver.UI.RotationConfigWindowTa: Some features that shouldn't be included in RS but help you.
The way to find the targets, hostiles or friends.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: RSR focuses on the rotation itself. These are side features. If there are some other plugins can do that, these features will be deleted.
RotationSolver.UI.RotationConfigWindowTa: About some general actions usage and conditions.
Some things that have to be lists.
All rotations that RS has loaded.
The abilities and custom conditions that your selected job has.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Used to customize when RSR uses specific actions automatically, click on an action's icon in the left list. Below, you may set the conditions for when that specific action is used. Each action can have a different set of conditions to override the default rotation behavior.
Forced Conditions have a higher priority. If Forced Conditions are met, Disabled Condition will be ignored.
TTK that this action needs the target be.
The HP ratio to auto heal
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.SpecialCommand: Open a window to use limit break.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Change the way that RSR automatically uses actions.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ActionSeque:
Click to make it reverse.
Is reversed : {0}
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: This will change the way that RSR uses actions.
InterruptDelayName: The range of random delay before interrupting hostile targets.
HealthForDyingTanksName: The HP%% for tank to use invulnerability
HealthTankRatioName: Heal tank first if their HP is lower than this.
HealthHealerRatioName: Heal healer first if their HP is lower than this.
HealOutOfCombatName: Heal party members when not in combat.
UseHealWhenNotAHealerName: Use healing abilities when playing a non-healer role.
OnlyHotOnTanksName: Use single target healing over time actions only on tanks
HealWhenNothingTodoName: Heal party members with GCD if there is nothing to do in combat.
OnlyHealSelfWhenNoHealerName: Only heal self When not a Healer
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.TargetHostileT: All targets that are in range for any abilities
LessMPNoRaiseName: Never raise player if MP is less than this
RaisePlayerByCastingName: Raise players while swiftcast is on cooldown
RaiseAllName: Raise any player in range (even if they are not in your party)
RaiseBrinkOfDeathName: Raise players that have the Brink of Death debuff
DrawMeleeOffsetName: Draw the offset of melee on the screen
ShowMoveTargetName: Show the target of the move action
SayOutStateChangedName: Audio notification for when the status changes
ShowInfoOnDtrName: Display plugin status on server info
KeyBoardNoiseName: Simulate the effect of pressing abilities
ShowToastsAboutDoActionName: Display do action feedback on toast
ShowToggledActionInChatName: Display toggle action feedback on chat
OnlyShowWithHostileOrInDutyName: Only show these windows if there are enemies in or in duty
NotInCombatDelayName: The range of random delay for Not In Combat.
ToggleManualName: Make /rotation Manual as a toggle command.
ToggleAutoName: Make /rotation Auto as a toggle command.
SayHelloToAllName: Say hello to all users of Rotation Solver.
AutoOffBetweenAreaName: Auto turn off when player is moving between areas.
AutoOffWhenDutyCompletedName: Auto turn off when duty completed.
AutoOffAfterCombatName: Auto turn off RS when combat is over more for more then...
StartOnCountdownName: Auto mode activation delay on countdown start
StartOnAttackedBySomeoneName: Automatically turn on manual mode and target enemy when being attacked
MinLastAbilityAdvancedName: The time ahead of the last oGCD before the next GCD being avaliable to start trying using it (may affect skill weaving)
ActionAheadForLast0GCDName: The time before an oGCD is avaliable to start trying using it
WeaponDelayName:
This is the clipping time.
GCD is over. However, RS forgets to click the next action.
ClickingDelayName: The range of random delay for clicking actions.
MaxPingName: The max ping that RS can get to before skipping to the next action.
MinUpdatingTimeName: The minimum time between updating RS information.
SpecialDurationName: The duration of special windows set by commands
CountDownAheadName: The starting when abilities will be used before finishing the countdown
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: In this window, you can set the parameters that can be customised using lists.
How many gcds are needed to add the status.
How many targets are needed to use this action.
In this window, you can set what macro will be trigger after using an action.
PoslockCastingName: Lock the movement when casting or when doing some actions.
UseStopCastingName: Stop casting if the target dies.
PoslockModifierName: The modifier key to unlock the movement temporary
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Conditions for forced automatic use of action.
Conditions for automatic use of action being disabled.
MoveTargetAngleName: The size of the sector angle that can be selected as the moveable target
DistanceForMovingName: Use gapcloser as a damage ability if the distance to your target is less then this.
MoveTowardsScreenCenterName: Use movement actions towards the object/mob in the center of the screen
MoveAreaActionFarthestName: Move to the furthest position for targeting are movement actions (Dangerous).
BossTimeToKillName: If target's TTK is higher than this, regard it as boss.
DyingTimeToKillName: If target's TTK is lower than this, regard it is dying.
ChangeTargetForFateName: Select only Fate targets in Fate
OnlyAttackInViewName: Only attack the target in view.
OnlyAttackInVisionConeName: Only attack the targets in vision cone
AddEnemyListToHostileName: Add enemy list to the hostile targets.
ChooseAttackMarkName: Prioritize mob/object targets with attack markers
FilterStopMarkName: Never attack targets with stop markers.
TargetAllForFriendlyName: Target all for friendly actions (include passerby)
MoveTargetAngleDescription:
If the selection mode is based on character facing, i.e., targets within the character's viewpoint are moveable targets. 
If the selection mode is screen-centered, i.e., targets within a sector drawn upward from the character's point are movable targets.
MoveAreaActionFarthestDescription: Move to the furthest position for targeting are movement actions.
MoveTowardsScreenCenterDescription: Use movement actions towards the object/mob in the center of the screen, otherwise toward object/mob your character is facing.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: You can The logic of hostile target selection to allow flexibility in switching the logic of selecting hostile in battle.
The folder contains the rotation library or the download url for the rotation library.
UseOverlayWindowDescription: This top window is used to display some extra information on your game window, such as target's positional, target and sub-target, etc.
DrawingHeightName: The height of the drawing things.
BeneficialPositionColorName: The color of beneficial AoE positions
HoveredBeneficialPositionColorName: The color of the hovered beneficial position
TargetIconSizeName: The size of the next ability that will be used icon.
ShowTargetTimeToKillName: Show the target's time to kill.
UseTasksForOverlayName: Use tasks for making the overlay window faster.
RotationSolver.Basic.Rotations.CustomRot: Time from next ability to next GCD
The state of auto. True for on.
The state of manual. True for manual.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Enemies that will never be targeted.
Enemies that will never be provoked.
The name of the enemy that you don't want to be targeted
The name of the enemy that you don't want to be provoked
RotationSolver.UI.RotationConfigWindowTa: Your custom time line about the specific duty.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Use tank personal damage mitigation abilities if the target is casting any of these actions
Use AoE damage mitigation abilities if the target is casting any of these actions
Ignores target if it has one of this statuses
Attacks the target first if it has one of this statuses
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ForcedEnabl: The conditions of forced to make it true.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ForcedDisab: The conditions of forced to make it false.
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.SpecialCommand: Open a window to do not use the casting action.
RaiseDelayName: Random delay range for resurrecting players.
RaisePlayerBySwiftName: Raise player by using swiftcast if avaliable
AutoSpeedOutOfCombatName: Use movement speed increase abilities when out of combat.
UseDefenseAbilityDescription: It is recommended to check this option if you are playing Raids or you can plan the heal and defense ability usage by yourself.
UseGroundBeneficialAbilityWhenMovingName: Use beneficial AoE actions when moving.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Time to untargetable that this action needs the timeline be.
TargetDelayName: Range of time before locking onto aggro'd or new target to attack
AutoCloseChestWindowName: Auto close the loot window when auto opened the chest.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Should this action check the stauts.
HealWhenNothingTodoBelowName: When their minimum HP is lower than this.
HealWhenNothingTodoDelayName: The delay of this type of healing.
HealthDifferenceName: HP for standard deviation for using AoE heal.
AutoHealTimeToKillName: Stop healing when time to kill is lower then...
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: The duty rotation you chose, click to modify.
Custom rotations are just like plugins and have full access to the game and your computer
Please only load rotations from sources that you trust
DownloadCustomRotationsName: Download custom rotations from the internet
AutoReloadRotationsName: Monitor local rotations for changes (Developer Mode)
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.StateCommandTy: Stop the addon. Always remember to turn it off when it is not in use!
DefaultRotations.Ranged.MCH_zBeta.Name: UseQueenWhenever
DefaultRotations.Ranged.MCH_zBeta.Displa: Uses Rook Autoturret/Automaton Queen immediately whenever you get 50 battery
RotationSolver.Basic.Data.TargetHostileT: All targets when solo, or previously engaged.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Please don't relog without closing the game. Crashes may occur.

Literally, Rotation Solver helps you to choose the target and then click the action. So any plugin that changes these will affect its decision.

Here is a list of known incompatible plugins:
Can't properly execute the behavior that RSR wants to do.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.WelcomeWind: Here's what you missed since the last time you were here
DefaultRotations.Melee.RPR_Default.Name: EnshroudPooling
DefaultRotations.Melee.RPR_Default.Displ: [Beta Option] Pool Shroud for Arcane Circle.
DefaultRotations.Ranged.DNC_Default.Name: HoldStepForTargets
DefaultRotations.Ranged.DNC_Default.Disp: Holds Standard Step if no targets in range (Warning, will drift & Buff may fall off)
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: Here are some rating methods to analysis this rotation. Most of these methods need your engagement.

This is the count of using last action checking in this rotation. First is average one, second is maximum one. The less the better.
Last used action is not a part of information from the game, it is recorded by player or author. 
It can't accurately describe the current state of combat, which may make this rotation not general. 
For example, clipping the gcd, death, take some status that grated by some action off manually, etc.

This is the count of using combat time in this rotation. First is average one, second is maximum one. The less the better.
Combat time is not a part of information from the game, it is recorded by player or author. 
It can't accurately describe the current state of combat, which may make this rotation not general.
For example, engaged by others in the party, different gcd time, etc.
DownloadCustomRotationsDescription: This will allow RSR to download custom rotations from the internet. This is a security risk and should only be enabled if you trust the source of the rotations.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.WelcomeWind: It looks like you might be new here! Let's get you started!
Rotation Solver Reborn does not come with rotations out of the box, but for your convenience a link to a set of rotations maintained by the Combat Reborn team is included by default.
Some other settings you may want to consider:
Do you want your rotations to update and reload automatically upon login?
Do you want to automatically reload local rotations when they are updated? (Developer Mode)
Would you like to install the default rotations now?
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: No rotations loaded! Please see the rotations tab!

It looks like this might be your first time here. Rotation Solver Reborn does not come with rotations out of the box, but you can download ones created by the community. You can also create your own rotations! For your convenience, Rotation Solver Reborn comes pre-loaded with links to well-known community rotations, but it still your responsibility to install them.
DefaultRotations.Magical.RDM_Default.Dis: Use Vercure for Dualcast when out of combat.
AoETypeName: What kind of AoE moves to use.
UseKnockbackName: Automatically use Anti-Knockback role actions (Arms Length, Surecast)
AoETypeDescription:
Full - Use all AoE actions
Cleave - Use only single target AoE actions
Off - Use no AoE at all
TargetDelayDescription: (Do not set too low, can rip newly aggro'd dungeon mobs off tanks).
HealthDifferenceDescription: Basically the health difference between a single party member and the whole party, used for deciding between healing a single party member or AOE healing. Leave this alone if you don't undertand its use.
RotationSolver.Data.UiString.ConfigWindo: How RSR should use healing abilities
